titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1937 WISSOTZKY Miss Irene 37 rue Davioud - 16e
3 mos 2 vols 100 dep. 100 refunded by cheque to Mme Herraux Jan 26, 1940 returned from Mme Herraux, Mme Herraux refunded cheque Jan 29 33 rue de l'Université Littré 76.25 wouldn't take back deposit Nov 4 Herrick's Poems Vols I - II (Muses Library) Nov 15 15 Irish Fairy Tales Nov 23 15 Breakfast in Bed Nov 23 23 Charwoman's Daughter Dec. 9 23 Advancement of Learning Dec 9 Dec. 9 The Wild Body Dec 22 9 Life of Francis Thompson 22 22 Gone with the Wind Jan. 24. 22 Grasbaw Jan. 4 Renewed Jan 1st 1938 - Jan 1st 1939 2 vols 300v 1938 Dec 29 paid by Mme Herraux Jan. 4 Pilgrim's Progress Jan. 24. Jan. 24 Poems of D. Ossiana. Jan. 28 24 Poems of Henry Vaughn. Vol. I. Jan. 28 Feb 10 Tales of the Unexpected Feb. 17 10 Dance of the Quick and the Dead Feb 17 17 The Soul of China Febr. 21 17 Crime of Cuba Febr. 21 Febr. 21 Milarepa March 2 21 Transition no 11 March 2 March 2 Arthur James Balfour (2 vols) March 7 March 22 Arabia Deserta vol. I. April 7 22 Letters of Emily Dickinson April 7
1938 II April 7 Sylvie and Bruno Concluded April 28 7 Selections from the Letters of Lew. Carro. April 28 to his friends 28 Seven Pillars of Wisdom May 2 28 Letters of Emily Dickinson May 9 May 2 King of Elfland's Daughter May 9 May 9 Curse of the Wise Woman May 16 Blessing of Pan May 16 May 16 Far From the Madding Crowd May 30 Rivet in Grandfather's Nieck Coming of Cuculain May 30 May 30 King Goshawk & the Birds June 7 30 Plough & the Stars June 7 June 7 Twenty Years A-Growing June 16 June 7 Triumph of Cuculain June 16 16 Yeats' Plays June 28 16 In the Gates of the North " 28 " 28 Drama of the Crossroads July 11 " 28 Aran Islands July 11 July 4 Nicholas Nickleby Sept 8 July 11 Madame D'Arblay's Diary Sept. 8 and Letters Vols I II III Sept. 8 " 11 Wordsworth's Poetical Works Sept 8 " 11 Story of Fanny Burney Sept. 8 " 11 Lyrical Ballads Sept. 8 " 11 Journal's of Dorothy Wordsworth Sept 8 Oct 10 Boswell's Life of Johnson Vol I Oct 31 10 Wilhelm Meister Oct 25 25 Boswell's Johnson Vol II ren. Oct 31 Nov 14 Nov 14 Boswell's Vol III Nov 28 " Moll Flanders Nov 28 Nov 28 Tibet's Great Yogi Milarepa Dec 5 28 Science of Fairy Tales 5 Dec 5 Secret Doctrine Vols. I + II Dec 14 Dec 14 Dog Beneath the Skin Dec 22
III WISSOTSKY To Jan 1st 1940 Dec 14 Correspondence of Thomas Gray Jan 6 14 Mahatma Letters Dec 22 22 Letters of Blavatsky to Sinnett Jan 6 Will be Renewed Jan 1 1939 - Jan 1 1940 Mme Henraux phoned Dec 30 sent cheque for 500f 1 subsc a 200 Dec 30 1 " B 300 500 1 new 1 old book Jan 6 My Country + My People Jan 16 6 English Mail Coach Jan 16 Jan 16 Three Guineas Jan 23 16 Welsh Short Stories 24 24 Fifth Column Feb 3 24 All Men Are Brothers Feb 3 3 In Hazard Feb 7 3 Tales of Wonder Feb 7 7 Handful of Dust Feb 10 7 Patches of Sunlight 6 10 Black Mischief 16 10 Green Hills of Africa 16 16 Eyeless in Gaza 28 16 Gilchrist's Life of Blake 28 28 Willie Winkie March 7 28 Joyce's Ulysses March 7 March 7 Diary of John Evelyn ren. 21 Mar 28 7 John Sargent Mar 14 14 Vision + Design Mar 28 28 Life in the Middle Ages - vol. I Apr 3 28 Family Reunion Apr 3 Apr 3 Life in the Middle Ages vols. II-III April 7 7 Letters of TE Lawrence ren Apr 12 April 17 12 Life of Charles Doughty Apr 17 17 Everybody's Autobiography Apr 25
IV WISSOTZKY Apr 17 Poet + 2 Painters Apr 25 25 Arabian Deserter 2 vols. May 9 May 9 Flying Dutchman May 16 9 Apropos of Dolores May 16 16 To Have + to Have Not May 26 16 Greenwood Hat May 26 26 Aristotle's Republic Politics June 12 26 Republic of Plato June 12 26 June 12 Very House. july 6 12 Gerald. july 6 July 6 Seven Brothers july 19 Frogs etc. Aristophanes july 19 Morte d'Arthur july 19 Tenant of Wildfell Hall july 19 Pointed Roofs july 19 Backwater july 19 Tunnel Honeycomb july 19 Flowering Judas july 19 19 In the land of youth. Aug 28 Suppliant maidens AESchylus Aug 28 Letters of john Keats Aug 28 Ben jonson vol I-II-III Aug 28 Crock of Gold. Golden Saying of Epictete Aug 28 (Aug 28 / books left with concierge across the street answered Oct 5th Oct. 23 Eyeless in Gaza 2 parcels. Nov 6 " Forest lovers 6.50 -> Total Nov 4 + 8.30 14.80 " Imaginary conversations Landor Nov 4 " Love + Lucy + Poems Nov 6 " Plays Pleasant + unpleasant Nov 4 " Simpleton & On the Rocks etc Nov 6
1939 WISSOTZKY To Jan 1 1940 post. forward Mlle Irene (temp. address) La Prise Tarot, Tessé-La-Madeleine (Orne) Nov 6 11,00 Midas Touch Dec. 18 Euphranor Nov. 20 Liber Amoris Nov. 20 Satires of Swift Dec 9 12 Elizabeth & Essex Dec. 18 15 4.50 Rains came Dec 9 Dec 11 Letters from Iceland Jan 6 11 8.30 Bird Alone Jan 6 11 38,60 Harlequin House Jan 6 1940 Claverings Jan 6 8,30 Religio Medici (Everyman) Jan. 26 46.90 Edwardians Jan. 26 paid by Harvest cheque Jan 9 1940 Clarissa Jan 6 Aspern Papers Jan 6 sent bill to Mme Henraux Jan. 26 Jan 6 Ginger Gruffin Jan. 26 (no more books to be sent) no news from Mme Henraux) where the books are returned to Mlle W. no more will be sent
